body:
Comment 4: 
You appear to equate assignment to a variable with use, even if the variable and it's
value is never subsequently used. If we replace all references to the variable c in your
original program by the blank identifier, it works as expected, which is why the value
of c is considered to be not used.

package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	a := make([]int, 5)
	for b, _ := range a {
		_ = b
	}
	fmt.Println(a)
}
